example.code:
PS C:\>$ric1 = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.ReservedInstancesConfiguration PS C:\>$ric1.AvailabilityZone = "us-east-1a" PS C:\>$ric1.InstanceCount = 1 PS C:\>$ric1.Platform = "EC2-VPC"
# ...create additional configuration instances as needed
# ...if more than one configuration was created, use array syntax e.g. -TargetConfiguration @( $ric1, $ric2 ) PS C:\>Edit-EC2ReservedInstance ` -ReservedInstancesId @("FE32132D-70D5-4795-B400-AE4350E35639", "0CC556F3-7AB8-4C00-B0E5-98666E89136F") ` -TargetConfiguration $ric1
example.description: This example modifies the availability zone, instance count and platform for the specified reserved instances. Platform may be either "EC2-VPC" or "EC2-Classic".
